mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.qnaid, A.memberid, m.nickname AS nickName, A.categoryname AS categoryName, A.qnatitle, A.qnacontent, A.createdat, A.answerstatus, rownum as rnum FROM (SELECT q.qnaid, q.memberid, c.categoryname AS categoryName, q.qnatitle, q.qnacontent, q.createdat, q.answerstatus FROM qna q, category c WHERE q.categoryid = c.categoryid ORDER BY q.createdat DESC) A, member m WHERE A.memberid = m.memberid) B WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
